issue.title: [Java] Extract a super interface for vectors whose elements reside in continuous memory segments
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6155](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6155). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For vectors whose data elements reside in continuous memory segments, they should implement a common super interface. This will avoid unnecessary code branches.

For now, such vectors include fixed-width vectors and variable-width vectors. In the future, there can be more vectors included.
